lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. granted an unprecedented waiver to Texas Tech center Esmir Rizvic on Monday, allowing him to remain eligible for an additional half-season. Rizvic missed the second half of last season after his eye socket was fractured by an opponent’s elbow. The N.C.A.A. had never granted an athlete a partial season of eligibility because of an injury.
